nodes.description: 1983年10月23日，伊朗支持的黎巴嫩真主党在贝鲁特美国海军陆战队兵营发动自杀式卡车爆炸，造成241名美军死亡
nodes.support_text: October 23, 1983 suicide truck bombing... killed 241 American servicemen

nodes.description: 2001年，241名幸存伤员及其家属分别提起两起诉讼，指控伊朗为恐怖袭击主谋
nodes.support_text: Two separate suits were filed in 2001; Lamberth considered the two together

nodes.description: 2002年伊朗被正式送达诉讼文件但未提出异议，法院进入缺席审理程序
nodes.support_text: Iran was served with the lawsuits in 2002 but failed to file any responses

nodes.description: 2002年12月，法院因联邦法律限制对伊朗的诉讼程序，暂缓执行缺席判决
nodes.support_text: the court entered default judgments... required to study the matter further under federal law

nodes.description: 2003年 bench trial（庭审）确认真主党在1983年完全受伊朗政府控制并执行爆炸任务
nodes.support_text: From the subsequent bench trial, Lamberth concluded that Hezbollah was formed under the auspices of the Iranian government

nodes.description: 法院认定美军在黎巴嫩执行的是和平keeping任务，而非战斗行动
nodes.support_text: the bulk of the evidence pointed clearly to a peacekeeping mission operating on stringent peacetime rules of engagement

nodes.description: 法官Lamberth裁定伊朗对爆炸事件承担国家恐怖主义责任，判决受害者有权获得司法救济
nodes.support_text: Lamberth ordered that the plaintiffs... have a 'right to obtain judicial relief' from Iran

nodes.description: 法院委托特别委员会处理赔偿金额计算，暂缓决定惩罚性赔偿
nodes.support_text: the court will determine compensatory damages after reviewing reports submitted by 'special masters'

nodes.description: 法官强调无法消除受害者创伤，但可通过惩罚施暴者实现部分正义
nodes.support_text: Lamberth wrote that the court had no power to 'heal the pain that has become a permanent part of the lives'
